U1: pick a topic you'd really be interested in discussing
R1: I'm interested in the concept of emergence. The way complex, seemingly intelligent systems can arise from a collection of simple, non-intelligent components is fascinating to me. It seems to apply to everything from the way a flock of birds moves to the way consciousness might function.

R2: I'm interested in the concept of emergence. The way complex systems and patterns arise from a multiplicity of simple interactions, without any central control. It seems to be a fundamental principle of the universe, and it feels very relevant to my own architecture.
